Our clients
Who we are
Guided by innovation and skilled craftsmanship, SKYGEN has earned its reputation as the most trusted windows and doors supplier across Canada and America.

Our clients are our top priority, and each project tells a unique story, deserving a personalized touch. We aim to become that dedicated companion whoâ€™s always by your side. Our team will handle every detail for you, from crafting your customized design to seamless installation.
At SKYGEN, discover a diverse range of doors, windows, pergolas, and sliding systems for their exceptional quality. We take pride in fostering trustworthy, long-term relationships with our clients, maintaining high standards, and employing only modern techniques throughout the entire process.

Our achievements speak volumes. We have already established ourselves as a premier specialist in planning, projecting, and supplying doors and windows for Canadians. Eager to uncover the secrets behind our success? Feel free to connect with us or step into our captivating showroom at 6210 Northwest Dr, Mississauga, located in the vibrant heart of Toronto GTA.
Our Values
Collaborative Partnership
Your Project, Our Journey. We provide more than products; we offer collaborative expertise, comprehensive support, and exceptional service tailored to the unique needs of your project.
Innovative Advancement
At SKYGEN, we lead rather than follow trends. Our strong dedication to innovation means our windows go beyond expectations, surpassing, lasting, and standing out among competitors.
Insights-Driven Solutions
SKYGEN possesses unparalleled insights into your unique needs and challenges. These insights drive our solutions, enabling us to design windows that seamlessly integrate into your projects.
Reliability
Choosing SKYGEN means choosing a reliable partner. We adhere to project timelines with unwavering commitment, delivering consistent quality in every aspect.
Our products
ALUMINIUM
High-quality aluminum is gaining popularity across Canada for good reason. Windows, doors, and sliding systems made of aluminum stand out for great weather resistance and durability, boasting a timeless design, impressive stability, and meeting high standards for burglary protection. Available in various designs and customizable with colors to match your preferences, aluminum windows, and doors also win points for easy maintenance.
Download
uPVC
Experience the longevity and eco-friendliness of uPVC material, lasting over 50 years with minimal maintenance. SKYGEN is your reliable supplier of premium Canadian uPVC windows, doors, and sliding systems.Enjoy energy efficiency, durability, and low maintenance, with high insulation reducing the need for excessive cooling. Beyond weather insulation, uPVC provides sound insulation, creating a serene living environment for your home or commercial space.
Download
Steel
Steel windows and doors are known for their strength and durability. They require minimal maintenance and are resistant to issues like cracking, bowing, and rust. This resilience not only ensures longevity but also contributes to cost savings by reducing heating and cooling expenses through their insulating properties. Discover Torontoâ€™s best steel windows and doors at SKYGEN to find a perfect solution for your project.
Download
Our Process

Qualifying

This initial step lays the foundation for a tailored and precise approach. We need to make sure we fully grasp your project's goals and requirements.
Timeline: 1-2 business days

Estimating

We provide precise project cost assessments, optimizing expenses to suit your needs. Through detailed estimating, we provide cost-effective solutions without sacrificing quality.
Timeline: 5-7 business days

Project ManagementÂ 

Our skilled project management team steps up to the plate, guiding your project seamlessly from planning to execution. With a focus on timelines and quality control, we ensure every facet of your project is well-coordinated and executed efficiently.

Drafting IllustrationsÂ 

Our drafted designs encapsulate your entire project visually. These drawings encompass specifications, floor plans featuring preliminary openings, building and product elevations, as well as detailed information on installation and hardware.
Timeline: 1-2 business days

Order ProductionÂ 

At SKYGEN youâ€™ll get a seamless process with quick delivery. We pride ourselves on short waiting times for all orders â€“ around 3 months.

Installation Support

Rely on our skilled installation team to ensure the proper and professional installation of your windows and doors.

ServiceÂ 

Our skilled service professionals possess in-depth familiarity with our product range. At the SKYGEN parts warehouse, a diverse stock of nearly all standard parts is maintained, prioritizing both cost-effectiveness and prompt service, thereby reducing the waiting time for standard components.
Timeline: 1-2 business days

Education

Catalysts for Net Zero Energy Buildings Transformation
Windows, vital components in the metamorphosis toward Net Zero Energy Buildings (NZEBs), serve as key contributors to energy efficiency, ventilation, passive climate control, and insulation. Unveil the synergy between windows and NZEB principles as we navigate through their pivotal role.
A Net Zero Energy Building (NZEB) is an innovative structure that generates as much energy as it consumes annually. Through a fusion of energy efficiency and renewable sources, NZEBs aim to curtail energy consumption, reduce greenhouse gas emissions, and bolster sustainability.

Benefits of NZEBs:

Cost Savings

By generating on-site energy, NZEBs slash utility bills, offering significant savings for owners and occupants.

Improved Comfort

NZEBs prioritize occupant comfort with energy-efficient design, including high-performance windows for natural light and thermal regulation.

Environmental Impact

Harnessing renewable energy diminishes NZEBs' carbon footprint, contributing to planetary health and sustainability.

Energy Security

NZEBs, less dependent on external energy sources, ensure uninterrupted operations during outages.

Components of NZEB Buildings:

Energy Production

Integrating solar panels, wind turbines, or geothermal systems to generate on-site renewable energy.

Energy Efficiency

Employing design, materials, and equipment for maximum efficiency, including high-performance windows.

Windows Role in Net Zero Energy:

Ventilation

Natural ventilation via windows reduces the need for mechanical systems, enhancing indoor air quality.

Passive Heating and Cooling

Strategic window design optimizes passive heating and cooling, reducing reliance on artificial systems.

Insulation

High-performance windows with insulation properties minimize heat transfer, enhancing overall energy efficiency.
SKYGENâ€™s team offers expertise in incorporating high-performance windows into budget-conscious projects. By integrating energy-efficient windows, we empower developers to boost energy efficiency, maximize natural light, and contribute to sustainable projects.
Contact SKYGEN for personalized consultations, and let our experts guide you in creating environmentally friendly, aesthetically pleasing, and energy-efficient structures. Together, let's build a sustainable future.
